org.jpws.pwslib.data
Interface PwsFileOutputSocket.RawFieldWriter

Enclosing class:
PwsFileOutputSocket
public static interface PwsFileOutputSocket.RawFieldWriter

Interface defining a device designed to write objects of type PwsRawField to an encrypted output stream. This writer organizes the appropriate block stream of the cipher depending on previously defined file parameters.

Closing the writer is possible to avoid further use, but does not close the underlying data stream.

Since:
2-0-0

          Closes this writer and flushes data.

          The number of written blocks in the underlying output stream.

          Writes a single raw field to the underlying (encrypted) output stream.
